```{r}
ugga_2021 = read.csv("../UGGA_Raw/2021/TextFiles/20220106_Flux_Output.csv")

ugga_2017 = read.csv("../UGGA_Raw/2017/TextFiles/2017_season_Flux_Output.csv")

ugga_comb = ugga_2021%>%
  full_join(ugga_2020)%>%
  full_join(ugga_2019)%>%
  full_join(ugga_2018)%>%
  full_join(ugga_2017)

ugga_comb%>%
```
